title: Cordae on From A Bird's-Eye-View [Extended Content]
itunes:title: Cordae on From A Bird's-Eye-View [Extended Content]
description:
What would Cordae like to hear God say when he meets him or her? Find out as he sits down with Lenard "Charlamagne Tha God" McKelvey. They discuss all the ways Cordae invests in the community through work with HBCUs, financial literacy, and philanthropy. Then hear how Cordae channeled the late Steve Jobs when introducing his new album, 'From A Bird's-Eye-View.'

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
